string.text:
A robust and versatile semi-automatic shotgun, perfect for close-quarters combat. With its rapid-fire capability, powerful spread and durable design, the M1014 excels in offering a dependable weapon to clear rooms or fend off threats with brutal force.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Italy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Benelli
